entry.source: 〉 You find an unfamiliar landscape{F801}before your eyes...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 You find an unfamiliar landscape{F801}before your eyes...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Stephen\0{F87A,14}{F813,0,54002}That girl would like to see you.{F801}She's to the east from here.{F801}
